translation: As the all-pervading ether is not tainted, due to its subtlety, so the Self seated everywhere in the body is not tainted either.
commentary: 13.33 as as? Sarvagatam the allpervading? from subtlety because of its subtlety? The sky ether? Not not? is tainted is tainted? Everywhere everywhere? situated seated? Dehe in the body? And so? Soul the Self? Not not? Upalipyate is tainted.Commentary Ether pervades everything. Everyone is immersed in it. There is no point where unto ether does not penetrate and pervade and yet it is not tainted by anything. Even
